content.value:
"I want you to describe me like one of your French girls"

#a11y #accessibility #AltText #Titanic

photo.alt: Rose (character from the movie, Titanic)  is reclining nude on a sofa. In front of her (blocking the view of most of her body) is a drawing pad being held by the hands of Jack that has the Twitter alt text screen photoshopped on it. That screen contains the top text "Write alt text" with a button labeled "Done". Center is the image again of Rose reclining nude on a sofa but this image the drawing pad in front of her is blank. Then below the image is a link with the text "What is alt text?" and "0/1000"
